events.message: I am reporting a vehicle collision that happened yesterday afternoon involving my car and another vehicle at the intersection.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the details provided by the customer regarding the car collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to assist with the investigation and handling of the auto accident claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your accident claim and thank you for providing the initial information promptly.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of your driverâ€™s license for claim processing.
The insured has submitted all requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos for review.
Our claims team has started investigating the circumstances of the auto accident and assessing the damages.
Investigation has been completed successfully, confirming the cause of the collision and extent of the damage.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the assessment reports and repair cost estimates.
The customer responded with concerns about the proposed settlement amount, requesting a review for additional damages.
Due to client concerns, the claim has been escalated to senior management for further review and resolution.
Following the review, the claim has been approved with an updated settlement figure addressing all reported damages.
The approved settlement amount has been processed and payment issued to the insured's designated bank account.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following payment and final confirmation from the insured.
